name: Mirror Maiden
desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightness…

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . The target character receives <color=#ffffff>Refraction</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Refraction</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this card is attached switches to another character:</color> Elemental Dice Cost +1.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (R</color> <color=#ffffff>ounds): 2</color>
(Only one such status can be applied on the same side at a time)

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

value.name: Mirror Cage
value.desc:
The Mirror's Secret

"Mirror, mirror, in my hand, where do our foes lurk in this land?"

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Mirror Maiden

value.name: Mirror Maiden
value.desc:
A Fatui mage who can command a Hydro Mirror in battle. Her posture is highly dignified, as if she is one who worships a god.
The Hydro Mirror she manipulates lures those enchanted by her to willingly fall for her illusion. Nothing seems to escape her ears. No one knows what those covered eyes have seen, nor what kind of obsession might be reflected in them...

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightness…

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Mirror Maiden's Journey

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "Hmm, where should I start... It was a Fatuus I met in Mondstadt's outskirts when I was still a stray cat... "
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Mirror Maiden" starts with the Talent Card "Mirror Cage" equipped.</color>
